page.title: 03Shopping in Gainsborough.
page.content: Every Friday night after I have got back from school we have our tea,and as soon as my father gets home we go shopping at Morrisons.Morrisons is a large{hypermarket}in Gainsborough and we have to drive five miles to get there.There is no shop in our village,but my mum says that even if there was we would still go to Morrisons because it is the cheapest way of shopping. At the shop there is a very big car park and a petrol station.We go in through automatic doors and we have to use two trolleys for all our shopping.The shop sells all sorts of different things.It sells food,records,tapes,furnitire,clothes and things for the garden but we usually go there to buy all the food that we need for the week.If we forget anything Dad buys it in Lincoln.
